From the brand

In the spring of 2018, with enthusiasm for digital products, a group of young people came together and found Andobil to help others enjoy Tech better.Staying curious and creative, we are always determined to combine minimalism with aesthetics to create products.Helping customers to enjoy the ultimate tech is our eternal pursuit.

ãPhone’s Safe Like in an Infant SeatãThis car phone holder with anti-scratched plate and soft rubber side pad design give your iPhone 13 iPhone 12 11 or Samsung 100% protection, makes your cell phones always sleep like a baby in the vent phone mount when driving. Secure air-bag design of this phone holder for car vent leaves zero scratches on your mobile phone even on bumpy roads.
ã0.1s Quick Release One Hand Operationã andobil car phone holder. More convenient and easier operation with new “Quick Release” button, comparing with other “One-hand operation” car phone mount, Andobil phone holder for car vent brings you brand new 0.1s-releasing experience. What’s more, the andobil car phone holder can withstand 300,000+ times open & close by repeated tests in Andobil laboratory.
ã360Â° Flexible Rotation as Wishã Best viewing angle when driving with this air vent car phone mount, it is designed with a 360Â° swivel ball joint, you can adjust your phone with a single hand for a horizontal, vertical, or more layout for navigating, phone talking, music listening, etc. Optimizing the perfect angle & position and offering safe driving experience.
ãWide Compatible with All Smartphonesã This andobil car cell phone holder is compatible with all cell phones from 4″ to 7″, the specially designed adjustable foot can be adjusted for different sizes and shapes, perfect for Apple iPhone 13 pro max, iPhone 13, iPhone 13, iPhone 12 pro max, iPhone 12, iPhone 12 mini, iPhone 11, X, XR, SE, 7, 6, Samsung Galaxy S21, S20, S10, Note 10, Moto G, Google Pixel, Huawei P30, Nokia, Xiaomi, OnePlus, Sony, LG, etc.
ãAndobil Car Phone Holder Serviceã Andobil is professional in designing and always making the best car phone holder for all the car drivers, including Uber, Lyft, Truck drivers, etc. what’s more, we will provide 2-year support. If you meet any questions or hesitations before purchasing or when using, please let us know, we would like to hear your voice and solve them for you in 12 hours.

Price: $17.99 - $12.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:56:30 UTC – Details)


Quick, Convenient and Hands-Free; the MagicMount is a powerful car phone mount magnetic system for conveniently mounting your smartphone, cell phone or larger smart devices to the dashboard in your vehicle, office, workshop, boat or RV. Lock your cell phone or device in place with this Scosche dash mount car holder featuring a 4-Axis adjustable ball joint neck with lock for optimal viewing at any angle. The integrated cable clips let you neatly connect your cables to the back of the magnetic phone car mount to keep cables from obstructing your view. Its cradle-free design eliminates the need to tighten around your device, just hover your phone magnet near the phone magnetic mount surface and it instantly locks securely in place. These powerful N50 neodymium magnets are very strong magnetic car phone mounts and are still 100% safe for modern smartphones and devices. The low-profile mount safely attaches to your dashboard using the automotive grade base to ensure optimal holding power. Compliment your cell phone automobile accessories with this car phone holder.
Magnetic Phone Holder – Comes with powerful Rare-Earth neodymium phone magnets that provide a secure grip to your iPhone, Android or Tablet. 100% mobile device safe. Simply stick the car mount magnet to the back of your phone case for a secure magnet hold.
Optimal Viewing – With 4-axis, 360-degree adjustable head and enhanced soft touch rubber lock-nut, this magnetic car mount allows viewing from any angle. Provides a great hands free experience.
Convenient Design – Integrated cable clip secures the charging cable to our car cell phone holder for a clean mount. The cradle-free design permits safe, easy one-handed use and access to all controls and ports.
Dashboard Accessories Included – phone mount, MagicPlates, protective film and user manual
Buy with Confidence – Backed by Scoscheâs Lifetime Tech Support and 3-year Warranty

Secure this mount onto any firm, flat and clean surface area

Does not interfere with wireless charging when using the proper MagicPlate placement

The heat resistant automotive grade mounting base will safely secure a Smartphone in your car, home or office

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

From the brand

LISEN electronic accessory stand helps us break the bad habit of looking down at the phone for a long time

Most comfortable height for the neck, shoulders and neck designed by German scientists according to ergonomics
Preserving a head-up or slightly upward gaze while using electronic devices can successfully avoid development of “text neck”
This new phone stand that is higher than the triangular phone base will be your most valuable product

LISEN New Stand Recommend

TALLER AND MORE PHOTOGENIC STAND, HELP TO CORRECT THE “TEXT NECK”: This cell phone stand holder is in accordance with ergonomic design. Providing you comfortable viewing angle which helps to fix your posture and reduce neck & back strain. The height can be easily adjusted between 7.1in-8.5in(1.4in adjustable range), the angle is adjustable between 5Â°~85Â°
USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN: [No bent & tangling & tip over worries] when using while charging. Due to bent cable, the low phone dock maybe fall over. LISEN stylish adjustable phone holder for desk has a reserved charging hole design, supports cable management, [No bent & tangling & tip over worries]. This phone pad will not cover the subtitle when you watch the video
WEIGHTED ANTI-SLIP BASE: This cell phone stand for desk is equipped with a weighted base and an aluminum alloy rod. Therefore, this iPhone stand holder is stable enough to support all smartphones or small tablets, such as 2021 iPad Mini, iPhone 14 pro max 13 Pro/13 Mini/12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/12 Mini/iPhone 11/11 Pro/Max/X/MAX/XR/8/8P, Samsung Galaxy S21, S20, Note 10/9/8/Plus, S10/S9/S8, Kindel, Switch, iPad Mini,iPad Air, etc.We recommend the most stable compatible device size is 4-10 inchs
ANTI-SLIP DESIGN: The pad back and the bottom of this cell phone stand are fully covered by anti-skid silicone, which LISEN iPad stand holder can provide maximum protection for your device from any scratches and slides, grips friendly
WE CARE ABOUT YOU: If the product arrives broken, or get broken within 365 days, please directly contact LISEN for satisfied solution. Any other problem like could not tighten the screw, please also contact us. We sincerely care about every customer’s shopping experience! (Product including: phone stand*1, screw*1, hexagon screwdriver*1, specification*1)






LISEN electronic Accessories stand help to save the bad habit that we are spending more and more time bow head to looking on our mobile phones

  • Choosing LISEN electronic accessories stand, the most suitable height designed by German scientists based on ergonomic shoulder and neck
  • As long as you insist on using it for 1 hour a day, Keep hold head looking up at electronic devices
  • Can effectively alleviate the formation of our “text neck”, help our family enjoy the joy of playing with electronic devices while staying healthy
  • This new style mobile electronic stand will be your most valuable product, higher than triangular cell phone dock, Save you from the bad habit of head down playing phone!

Questions & Answers

Q1: Is this cell phone stands stable for a big phone and tablets?

Answer: Yes. this phone holder can support all cell phones. In addition, LISEN iPhone stand for desk can also stably adapt to small tablets less than 10 inchs, like 2021 iPad mini etc.

Q2: How tall is this cell phone stand holder?

Answer: The height of this desk phone stand is 1.4 inches adjustable, is flush with the face or slightly higher, so that you can be more calm and elegant during video calls.




Thoughtful Storage Base

Aesthetics of desk fashion With a storage base design, this iPhone stand holder can help to organize small things, such as airphones, rings, clips to avoid losing them.

Cable Organizer & Charging Hole

Featured with reserved charging hole and cable organizer circle, this cell phone holder stand is convenient for charging, and make your desk neat and tidy. No worry with cable tangling.

Full Covered Silicone Pad

Fully covered by soft silicone pad (back and feet), it can protect devices from scratch while 4 to 10 inch devices sitting comfortably. And it can support up to 0.53 inch thick phones with case.

ãAmazing Maximum Height to 67inãWith a minimum storage space to 20in, easy to carry when traveling, hiking or camping. Fully Extendable to 67in, allowing you to take photos of the whole family and capture the best moments.
ãSelfie Stick Tripod & Phone Tripod StandãSwitch freely between selfie stick mode and tripod stand mode. The tripod is applicable to any situation such as video shooting, group photos, vlogging, adventuring, and taking selfies. Plus, it works in landscape or portrait mode.
ãStrongÂ and SturdyãMade of highly-durable aluminum-alloy material with stainless steel, ABS plastic, designed with base locking knob in the center to prevent tilting or wobbling. The most frequent issues occur at other selfie stick tripods are solved by our 67”Â tripod.
ãEverything you Need in One BoxãSupplied with both a phone holder for mobile phones andÂ BC parts for Go pro as well as a Wireless Remote for long-distance control, this is the complete solution for the Content Creator.Â A do-everything, go-anywhere kit that’s been put together for today’s influencer and content creator: Youtuber, Instagrammer, Tiktoker, etc.
ãWide CompatibilityãUniversal phone Holder fits most smartphones with or without a case, compatible with Galaxy S9/S9 Plus/Note 8/S8/S8 Plus/S7 Edge/J7, Samsung, Huawei. With a universal 1/4 inch screw, it fits for the DSLR, SLR, action camera, webcam, camcorder.
ãPerfect After-sale ServiceãUBeesize provides 24-month replacement service and lifetime friendly after-sales service. Any questions, feel free to contact our customer service staff.

Product Description

Power Tool Organizer

3 Quick and Easy Ways This Power Tool Orangizer Wall Mount Will Save Money, Time and Make You Money Even If Your Already the Best Tradesperson in the world!!

STOP WASTING MONEY: Made from ultra durable SPCC cold rolled steel, this power tool organizer is designed by professionals and is built to last which means you wont be wasting your hard earned money on fragile timber tool organizers!SAVE TIME: This power tool storage rack features 5 slots to hold cordless power tools, and 2 open shelves to keep your tools organized in one central location. No more wasting time looking through drawers , toolboxes and random places for your tools again which means you will have time to sit down and watch the game or spend more time with the kids!MAKE MORE MONEY: Holds up to 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16â to Â½â and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools which means youâll locate your tools quickly and complete projects fast so you can get to your next customer/client!

HAPPY WIFE , HAPPY LIFE: Having your tools organized and ready to go at a moments notice for any project will allow you to complete those honey-do list jobs that you’ve been getting bugged about for months which means you will be in the good books and not the dog house!INCREDIBLE SUPPORT: Each exclusive tool storage shelf can support up to 66 pounds which means you’ll feel safe that your load and tools will always be supported!PROTECTION AGAINST DAMAGE: Featuring a high-quality powder-coated finish which helps you protect against damage and is easy to wipe clean !

From the brand

DaFang is committed to developing and designing organizer and storage clean tools products, included broom rack and mop holder. Save your home space and make your life more easy.

IMILLET Broom Organizer

Tidy Your Home: 5 ball slots and 6 hooks design, organize your annoying cleaning tools within small space.
Spring Loaded: Special spring clips design with rolling rubber ball that make sure the broom and mop will not fall out,including wet mop, dirty rakes, stick vacuum and other heavy stuff
Wide Compatible To Everywhere: Apply to your garage, garden, kitchen, laundry, offices and more. It is strong and sturdy. Keep solid on the wall with the slots and screws (Included). It can organize most of tools of your home.
Heavy Duty: Mop holder grip everything tightly and securely. Each rolling ball holds up to 6.5 pounds of weight(smooth rod is up to 3 pounds), holder can hold up to about 11 tools in total. Made of high quality ABS and slots and screws.We upgraded our products after 2018 July 1st, and we improved the quality of this products that are easy-to-drop. Now the products can grip everything tightly and securely.
Easy Install: Wall mounted, detailed installation steps on the package. Easy to install with slots and screws (included).

  • There are 5 ball slots and 6 hooks so you can organize as much cleaning utilities, organizer designed to hold various household objects with handles of varying thickness, Hooks can be folded up and out of the way.
  • Simply insert a handle into a slot and a rounded, spring loaded, rolling ball automatically adjusts to the handle’s thickness and grips it securely, Easy release by lifting the handle.
  • Fast and Easy to install, 6 screws to hold the wall mount organizer to ensure strong and sturdy holding. Each rolling ball holds up to 6.5 pounds of weight(smooth rod is up to 3 pounds), holder can hold up to about 11 tools in total.

Read more

Upgrade Broom Rack

The new broom holder allows for the handle to slide in from the front and is held tight in place.Just use one hand to put broom in holder,even the kids also can do it,easy to use.

Space Saver

Imillet broom holder can keep your broom, closet, kitchen, garage, garden, bathroom, or laundry room in organized. Also suitable for garden and yard tools racks storage and organize.

5 Slots 6 Hooks

5 postions can hold up mop, broom, dustpan, shovel, small vacuum, small garden tools and others.6 foldable hooks are great for rags, bristle brushes, swifters, fly swatter and other small tools.
